thread.title: Sprint, Taking Aim at AT&T, Offers DirecTV Subscribers Free Year of Cell Service
thread.title_full: Sprint, Taking Aim at AT&T, Offers DirecTV Subscribers Free Year of Cell Service - WSJ

author: Ryan Knutson
title: Sprint, Taking Aim at AT&T, Offers DirecTV Subscribers Free Year of Cell Service
text:
Sprint Corp. is taking the wireless price war to a whole new level.
The carrier said it would give away a free year of wireless service to DirecTV subscribers who switch to Sprint—a direct attack on AT&T Inc., which recently completed a $49 billion acquisition of the satellite TV provider. Bringing DirecTV subscribers onto AT&T’s wireless service is central to the carrier’s logic for the acquisition.
Sprint’s offer,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
